name: GENESIS (itch) (Bocary)
description:
This game was a submission to the K-Jam, held by Aarhus University, Denmark. Theme: Recreation.

#1 Theme

#1 Graphics

Programming: Marco Frøkjær Wejse

Concept design and music; Victor Schriver Hennings

Goal: Collect as many stars as possible, by recreating the destroyed island.

Music: Original

Code: Original

Art: Aleksandr Makarov (itch.io). Some sprites edited and repainted by Victor S. Hennings.

SFX: Purchased license at epidemicsound.com
